name: loolin
body: |- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0)), wi(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0)), wi(w1, w0))
-| wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0)), wi(w1, wi(w1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0)), wi(w1, w0))
-| wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0)), wi(w1, wi(w1, w0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0)), wi(w1, wi(w1, w0)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0)), wi(w1, w0))

comment: The Linearity Axiom of the infinite-valued sentential logic (L-infinity) of Lukasiewicz. See ~ loowoz for an alternate axiom. (Contributed by Mel L. O'Cat, 12-Aug-2004.)
